      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map<BoardSquare,java.util.List<Tile>> Board.getAllPossiblePlaces()

      This method returns the possible places on which the tile can be placed.

      A method that returns all possible boardsquares on which the tile can be placed.
      java.util.Map<BoardSquare,java.util.List<Tile>> Board.getPossiblePlaces(java.util.List<Move> selected, boolean isRow, boolean isColumn)
      The main method with checks all the boardsquares that are selected and generates a map with relates an empty boardsquare to possible tiles that can be place.
      java.util.Map<BoardSquare,java.util.List<Tile>> Board.getPossiblePlacesByMoves(java.util.List<Move> selectedMoves)
      This function returns possible places based on previous moves.
      java.util.Map<BoardSquare,java.util.List<Tile>> Board.getPossiblePlacesBySquares(java.util.List<Move> selected)
      Retrieve all possible places by the selected Moves
